mapper.select: select p.payment_no paymentNo, p.address_no addressNo, p.payment_price paymentPrice, p.payment_method paymentMethod, a.address_detail addressDetail, p.payment_state paymentState from payment p inner join address a on p.address_no = a.address_no where customer_mail = #{customerMail} order by payment_no desc

select o.payment_no paymentNo, o.orders_no ordersNo, o.goods_no goodsNo, gf.goods_file_name goodsFileName, gf.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt, g.goods_title goodsTitle, g.goods_memo goodsMemo, o.orders_amount ordersAmount, g.goods_price * o.orders_amount totalPrice, p.payment_state paymentState from orders o inner join goods g on o.goods_no = g.goods_no inner join payment p on o.payment_no = p.payment_no left join (select gf.goods_file_name, gf.goods_file_ext, gf.goods_no from goods_file gf limit 1) gf on gf.goods_no = o.goods_no where o.payment_no = #{paymentNo}
